dmca.title: Global Sources doesn't want to be source of others' text
dmca.body:
I am in-house Legal Counsel for, and am writing on behalf of, Global Sources Ltd. and its subsidiaries (including Trade Media Holdings Limited ('"TMHL") and TMHL's subsidiary. World Executive's Digest Limited ("WEDL")).

TMHL owns, and WEDL publishes and operates (under licence from TMHL), a website known as "TEXT IN CHINESE" or
